title: Damage costs from invasive species exceed management expenditure in nations experiencing lower economic activity
content:
Publication date: June 2024

Source: Ecological Economics, Volume 220

Author(s): Corey J.A. Bradshaw, Philip E. Hulme, Emma J. Hudgins, Brian Leung, Melina Kourantidou, Pierre Courtois, Anna J. Turbelin, Shana M. McDermott, Katherine Lee, Danish A. Ahmed, Guillaume Latombe, Alok Bang, Thomas W. Bodey, Phillip J. Haubrock, Frédérik Saltré, Franck Courchamp
